title: really struggling with the climb and need advice I play cheerleader ardent/athene sona
body:
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Zitanee
just kidding 
I am a masculine fist of the north star man with a 78% win rate from my manly adc/mid lane speedboat forklift hypercarry sona

I actually fired the adc b/c all they do is feed and ask for peel and permanently replaced him as the true carry of the team

adcs are worthless peasants

replies.body:
It's not about how fast you get there. 
It's not about what's waiting on the other side. 

It's the cliiiiiiimb!

> [{quoted}](name=Cancerous Lulu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RPfYAE2i,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-05T09:00:46.538+0000)
>
> Is this an AMA thread? Because if it is I will throw some question...
> 
> Thoughts on 6.14 changes? Did you actually "feel" the buffs/nerfs compared to before 6.14?
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

you feel the q nerf early game and the e duration buff while roaming

by the 2nd rank of r you notice the scaling cdr and by the 3rd rank its probably a 15%-20% buff over original sona

right

so  whats taking place when I shit on d1-d2s with the same cheese? besides your whiny support jealousy?

something a utility support main will never understand
you cant brute force wins based on your own mechanics because supports cant carry games 
they can only assist players that are capable of winning

thats why you take 600 games to get to the same elo with only a 52% win rate and I have almost 80%

idk why ur salty about someone smurfing
you legit have to be delusional or in denial to see someone with a 17:1 kda and say they are getting carried

Oh, you're not all that low rank. And you did it offmeta, all by yoursel...

Wait...dynamic preference?

And you think your rank is indicative of your personal skill? Hilarious.

> [{quoted}](name=MEMEME670,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RPfYAE2i,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-08-06T06:37:42.009+0000)
>
> Oh, you're not all that low rank. And you did it offmeta, all by yoursel...
> 
> Wait...dynamic preference?
> 
> And you think your rank is indicative of your personal skill? Hilarious.

my past like 10-15 games have been duo q who gives a fuck I was already d4 with over 70% win rate lmao
At d4 people are still silly enough to fall for your cheese. So that's not surprising.
What the OP isn't telling you is that he's grouped .......just saying

> [{quoted}](name=DargoTrox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RPfYAE2i,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-05T15:29:08.768+0000)
>
> What the OP isn't telling you is that he's grouped .......just saying

grouped with what? that acct is solo only

using a about few week from s4 to d3 , using lux and sona only with both over 15 kda , win rate 76% and 86% not sure are you challenger smurf account or what , not even script or boosted can get that level of plays , very impressive

> [{quoted}](name=Rory iluminami,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RPfYAE2i,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-05T08:17:05.790+0000)
>
> using a about few week from s4 to d3 , using lux and sona only with both over 15 kda , win rate 76% and 86% not sure are you challenger smurf account or what , not even script or boosted can get that level of plays , very impressive

http://www.twitch.tv/awildapsona

> [{quoted}](name=Zitanee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RPfYAE2i,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-05T08:22:59.073+0000)
>
> http://www.twitch.tv/awildapsona

omg welcome back , definitely support <3
